text: Cult of Chucky is a 2017 American slasher movie written and directed by Don Mancini. The seventh installment of the Child's Play franchise. It stars Brad Dourif as Chucky, with a supporting cast of Fiona Dourif, Alex Vincent, and Jennifer Tilly. It was released with rated and unrated versions distributed by Universal Pictures Home Entertainment via Blu-ray, DVD and VOD on October 3, 2017. As of October 2017, the movie has grossed $2 million from DVD and Blu- ray sales. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Category:2017 horror movies Category:Child's Play movies Category:Movies directed by Don Mancini
title: Cult of Chucky
